00367 #define ZLL_COLOR_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00368   { \
00369     .id = COLOR_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ID, \
00370     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00371     .attributesAmount = ZCL_COLOR_CONTROL_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00372     .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00373     .commandsAmount = ZCL_COLOR_CONTROL_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00374     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00375   }
00376 
00377 #define ZLL_COLOR_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00378   { \
00379     .id = COLOR_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ID, \
00380     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00381     .attributesAmount = ZCL_COLOR_CONTROL_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00382     .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00383     .commandsAmount = ZCL_COLOR_CONTROL_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00384     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00385   }
00386 #define DEFINE_COLOR_CONTROL_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) ZLL_COLOR_CONTROL_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)
